DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether positron emission tomography using the new imaging agent 18F-FAC can be used for imaging cancer and/or inflammation.
DOC.brief_title: The Biodistribution of 1-[2 Deoxy-2, -18 Fluroarabinfuranosyl]Cytosine [18FAC] in Healthy Subjects and Patients With Cancer, Autoimmune/Inflammatory Diseases
DOC.criteria: > 18 years of age women of childbearing potential will undergo a pregnancy test free of charge patients with cancer or autoimmune diseases or healthy subjects
